item.description:
This Saturday Midnight Rodeo Bar will celebrate its 2nd anniversary.  Seems like yesterday word had gotten out that a new country dance hall was opening and we all couldn't wait to check it out.  Many thanks for all the work that Deb and Dave have done to give us all a wonderful place to dance and make friends.  The Jonathan Scott Band (formerly Jonathan Scott and Blazing Hearts) will be providing great tunes to dance to, Michelle Jackson will make happy feet with her fun dance instruction from 7:30 to 8:30 pm and DJ Rich will spin the tunes in between time.  If you signed up for the partner dance instruction, hats off to you! OH...did I mention that there will be hamburgers/hot dogs/chips for a fee after the partner class?  Come party with us and celebrate MRB....looking forward to see ya ....on the dance floor!

 



 

Howdy and welcome to new member ILUVRAW!!  yeehaw!!
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign on a table near the bar
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
